Desde jovem, me vi atra√≠do pelas complexidades da codifica√ß√£o e desenvolvimento web, passando in√∫meras horas experimentando diferentes linguagens de programa√ß√£o e estruturas. paragraphs.0: I have a technical degree in systems development at Senai Jandira. My time at the organization allowed me to delve deeper into the theoretical aspects of programming, algorithms, and data structures, which laid a strong foundation for my career. I also had the opportunity to collaborate on exciting projects, such as my final project called Grati, a feedback management platform that allows organizations to adopt a feedback culture.
